notion.#integration_token: Notion integration token, acquired on Notion Developer portal.
notion.#interval: Interval in milliseconds between Notion API requests.
notion.#interval_notice: There's no point in using an interval lesser than a minute-long one, as Notion last_edited_time only includes minutes.

discord.#token: Discord bot token, acquired on Discord Developer portal.
discord.#log: Log channel ID, channel can be both DM channel and guild channel.
discord.#startup_null: Set 'startup' to 'null' if you want the bot to not send anything on startup.
discord.#startup_behaviour: Otherwise, use the discord.js message structure.

embed.#behaviour: Use the discord.js message embed structure here to customize your default embed properties, such as color and etc.
